heading: Unique PFP Avatar
text: 1,000 NFT PFP - profile pictures of female androids designed by Hardmetacore (Alessandra Vuillermin)

heading: Exclusive DCL Wearable
text: Each Casadei Blade NFT Asset is a metaverse wearable in Decentraland - added to the Decentraland linked wearable registry

heading: Limited Edition Blade Heel
text: Each Casadei Blade NFT is redeemable for the physical version.Each physical Casadei Blade has an NFC chip embedded in the sole authenticity verification/history
